description: This table contains Denial/Remark/Correspondence/Variance information from the Denial/Correspondence (BDC) master file. It includes information about the denial/remark code received or correspondence text as applicable. It also includes some general information about the current state of the record. It does not include the change history information and specific denial information from the explanation of benefits (EOB).

columns.name: BDC_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the denial/correspondence record.

columns.name: BDC_NAME
columns.description: BDC Record Name - Denial/Remark/Correspondence Record Name.

columns.name: RECORD_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record type category ID for the Denial/Remark/Correspondence.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Denial


Remark


Correspondence


Underpayment


Overpayment

columns.name: BUCKET_ID
columns.description: The Hospital Liability Bucket that the Denial/Remark/Correspondence record is linked to.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status category ID for the Denial/Remark/Correspondence.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Created


Transferred


Reopened


Completed


Voided

columns.name: RECORD_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source category ID for the Denial/Remark/Correspondence.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Payment Received


Correspondence Received


Zero Allowed Amount


Expected Allowed Amount Updated


Reserved for future use


System Auto Action Claim Denied


PB Follow-up Automatic Activity


RAC Correspondence


ADR Correspondence


HH Pre-Claim Review


Transferred In

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the claim print record for the invoice of the denied payment.

columns.name: INVOICE_NUMBER
columns.description: The invoice number associated with this denial/correspondence.

columns.name: GRP_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item holds the group code associated with the reason code in a denial correspondence record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Patient Responsibility


Contractual Obligation


Payor Initiated


Correction and Reversal


Other Adjustment

columns.name: REMIT_CODE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the remittance code associated with the record.

columns.name: REMIT_CODE_ID_REMIT_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of each remittance code.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_CODE
columns.description: The external ID of the remittance code associated with this denial/correspondence.

columns.name: INV_END_DATE
columns.description: Ending Date on the invoice linked to the denial/remark.

columns.name: SOURCE_PMT_HB_TX_ID
columns.description: ID of the Hospital Billing payment transaction that the denial/remark was linked to.

columns.name: EXP_ALLOW_AMT
columns.description: Expected allowed amount on denial/remark/correspondence record.

columns.name: RESOLVE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Resolution Category for Denial/Remark/Correspondence if it has been resolved.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Auto-Closed


No Outstanding Insurance Balance 


Claim Resubmitted


PB Charges Voided


PB Charges Reposted


PB Payment Undistributed


PB Original Follow-up Completed

columns.name: RESOLVE_COMMENTS
columns.description: Comments entered with resolution category.

columns.name: BDC_RECEIVE_DATE
columns.description: The date the Denial/Remark/Correspondence was received.

columns.name: BDC_COMPLETE_VOID_DATE
columns.description: The date the Denial/Remark/Correspondence record was completed or voided.

columns.name: BDC_REOPEN_DATE
columns.description: The date the Denial/Remark/Correspondence record was re-opened after being completed.

columns.name: PB_INVOICE_ID
columns.description: The professional invoice associated with the denial/correspondence record.

columns.name: GUARANTOR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the guarantor associated with the denial/correspondence record.

columns.name: DOC_INFO_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the document that is associated with the denial/correspondence record.

columns.name: WRITE_OFF_AMT_SYS
columns.description: The write off amount calculated by the system.

columns.name: WRITE_OFF_AMT_CALC
columns.description: The write off amount entered by the user. If that is blank, this is the write off amount calculated by the system.

columns.name: DISCREPANCY_AMT_SYS
columns.description: The difference between the expected allowed amount on the correspondence record and the actual allowed amount.

columns.name: CLM_EXT_VAL_ID
columns.description: The Claim External Value ID of the Claim Print ID that was denied.

columns.name: BILLING_DRG
columns.description: This item stores the billing DRG sent on the claim or coded on the account. The billing DRG is looked up first from the claim and then from the account. It can be manually overridden.

columns.name: PAYER_RECOMMENDED_DRG
columns.description: The user recorded payer recommended DRG from the payment that created the follow-up record.

columns.name: FINAL_RESOLUTION_DRG
columns.description: The user recorded final resolution DRG.

columns.name: EXPECTED_RECOVERY_AMT
columns.description: This item contains the amount of the expected payment as a result of resubmitting the claim associated with this denial.

columns.name: ACTUAL_RECOVERY_AMT_USER
columns.description: This item contains the amount actually paid as a result of resubmitting the claim associated with this denial. This can be overridden.

columns.name: WRITE_OFF_AMT_USER
columns.description: This item contains the amount of this denial that was written off.

columns.name: EXT_PAT_NAME
columns.description: This item is used to record the patient name if the record of the patient is in an external system.

columns.name: EXT_PAT_MRN
columns.description: This item is used to record the patient's medical record number if the record of the patient is in an external system.

columns.name: EXT_ADMIT_DATE
columns.description: This item is used to record the patient admit date if the record of the patient is in an external system.

columns.name: EXT_DISCHARGE_DATE
columns.description: This item is used to record the patient discharge date if the record of the patient is in an external system.

columns.name: EXT_CLAIM_NUM
columns.description: This item is used to record the claim number if the record of the patient is in an external system.

columns.name: EXT_PAT_BIRTH_DATE
columns.description: This item is used to record the patient's date of birth if the record of the patient is in an external system.

columns.name: SOURCE_PMT_PB_TX_ID
columns.description: Professional Billing payment transaction which led to denial/correspondence record creation.

columns.name: DFLT_CLASS_USES_REMARK_CODE_ID
columns.description: Stores the highest priority associated remark code for denials if this remark was used to get default classification items. Default classification items include priority, preventable, owning area, source area, and code category.

columns.name: DFLT_CLASS_USES_REMARK_CODE_ID_REMIT_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of each remittance code.

columns.name: APPEAL_DEADLINE_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the initial appeal deadline at the moment the BDC is created.
